101010001.text: Has anyone seen the elderly Wen Tianweng?

101010002.text: Maybe he was captured by monsters of the Legion?

101010003.text: Trust me, Arlan, no one would want to kidnap a grumpy old man. {NICKNAME}, have you seen him?

101010004.text: So there are actual old people on the space station?
101010004.option: So there are actual old people on the space station?

101010006.text: In any case, it'd be greatly appreciated if you could keep us posted. The old man might have gone traveling among the stars with friends from his younger days.

101010007.text: Let us know if you ever run into him

101010005.text: It is possible that someone might want to kidnap a grumpy old man...
101010005.option: It is possible that someone might want to kidnap a grumpy old man...

101050001.text: Might I take a moment of your time, {NICKNAME}? Any chance you are familiar with classical poems?

101050002.text: Ahem, I don't usually speak like this. Must have read too much poetry recently

101050003.text: I got an encrypted letter. It must be really good, because I can't understand a single word

101050004.text: You seem pretty smart, so please come back and help me out with this one as soon as you have time. Otherwise, sooner or later, I'll just die from the curiosity alone

101120000.text: The backend detected a weird quantum fluctuation just now. You were right beside it at the time. What happened?

101120001.text: I just whacked the Curio a few times and the crack on it disappeared. I can't even believe it myself

101120005.text: The backend data from Panopticon System does show it has been fixed, and is activated at the moment. It's been giving out a steady energy reading

101120006.text: It may be pure luck, but this is too much of a coincidence. Hey, could it be that your hand was blessed by an Aeon?

101120007.text: ...Alright, I'm kidding. No matter how, you are the one who did it. I've sent you the reward. Remember to check it out

101120002.text: I just whacked the Curio a few times and the crack on it disappeared. I can't even believe it myself

101120004.text: ...Is this what they call a "percussive maintenance?"

101130000.text: {NICKNAME}, you said you're back at the space station?

101130001.text: There's something that I can only talk to you about...

101130002.text: If it's not too much trouble, could you come over for a chat?

101130003.text: I have a bad feeling about this...
101130003.option: I have a bad feeling about this...

101130004.text: No, no! It's not anything weird. I just need to discuss something with you in person

101130005.text: Since it's just kinda embarrassing to talk about it over messaging

101130008.text: I'll be waiting for you at the usual spot. Please hurry

101130006.text: No need to bother you. I'm headed back to the Express
101130006.option: No need to bother you. I'm headed back to the Express

101130007.text: Hey, stop teasing! I really do have something urgent to talk about!

111350000.text: Were you the one who helped Wen Shiling with her experiment?

111350002.text: Didn't expect you to be so smug about it.

111350005.text: Oh, spoil her, would you? I don't even know how her report got through the assessors to me...

111350006.text: Anyway, I'm going to terminate the approval process for this experiment. Please refrain from participating in future scientific assessments.

111350003.text: Who's Wen Shiling? I don't know her.
111350003.option: Got nothing to do with me...

111350004.text: But in the experiment report that she submitted, your name was listed on the assistant column.

200130000.text: Do you know what a rich mindset is?

200130001.text: Do you wanna know about "a rich mindset"?

200130002.text: ...Do you really want to ask me that, Miss Asta?

200130005.text: Can I get a screenshot of this

200130008.option: Can I still recall that message?

200130009.text: Can I still recall that message?
200130009.option: Can I still recall that message

200130010.text: It's okay. It's not a big deal

200130011.text: I have the misfortune to be invited to do a streamed seminar, again. The topic this time is "Summit Talk: A rich mindset will change your financial views and lift your perspectives on wealth."

200130012.text: I need to convince them this topic is super boring

200130013.text: Who would want to watch that

200130014.text: I'd rather watch Peppy play with a holodisc
200130014.option: I'd rather watch Peppy play holodisc

200130017.text: Do you mind if I take another screenshot?

200130015.text: I'd rather watch a robot deliver food
200130015.option: I'd rather watch a robot deliver food

200130003.text: Don't know, don't wanna, don't get it, don't care, don't wanna care

200250000.text: [I am participating in Cosmo Premium's special auction. Tap the button to help me take <unbreak>50%</unbreak> off the handling fee and win other surprise discounts. Event link: ██████]

200250001.text: [I've added an interesting item to the cart on Cosmo Premium. Help me pay for it: ████████]

200250002.text: Are you really Asta? Feel like you've been hacked...

200250012.text: Sorry, I accidentally clicked the wrong button

200250013.text: It's fine now. The page is already invalid...

200250014.text: Don't worry. I'd never open such a link
200250014.option: Don't worry. I didn't open it

200250019.text: I was shopping just now, but I didn't notice that my cart was full, and then I hurried to make the purchases

200250020.text: I accidentally sent you the link when I tapped too fast

200250022.text: I also want to have the problem of placing orders too fast
200250022.option: I want to encounter this problem too

200250021.option: I want to encounter this problem too

200250023.text: I'm just buying some stuff for the space station

200250016.text: Actually, I'm a little curious — do you use coupons when you shop? Do you know what coupons are?
200250016.option: I'm curious. Do you use coupons?

200250017.text: Why would I not use them? {NICKNAME}, why do you always ask weird questions?

200250005.text: I'd like to help you pay, but I can't open the link you sent me...

200250008.text: You didn't pay for it, did you? If you did, let me know how much you paid, so I can give the money to you

200250009.text: You have been blocked and can no longer send messages to them

200260000.text: {NICKNAME}, do you know where Peppy has been lately?

200260001.text: Sorry, I was busy before and didn't pay much attention to Peppy
200260001.option: Sorry, I didn't pay much attention to Peppy

200260004.text: I'm waiting for the results of Peppy's physical exam from the Medical Department

200260005.text: His front leg appears to be lame, but there is no obvious wound

200260006.text: I checked the surveillance of the space station and didn't see how he hurt his leg

200260007.text: Well, pets are just as naughty as children. Could he be pretending to be lame on purpose?
200260007.option: Could he be pretending to be lame?

200260008.text: I don't know... Peppy is not naughty at all

200260013.text: It says that he is in perfect health

200260014.text: It says that he is not hurt

200260015.text: There are no signs of fractures anywhere

200260016.text: So, why would Peppy pretend to be lame? What can he get out of it?

200260017.text: I have no idea at all

200260018.text: You've been so busy lately. Did you not play with him enough?
200260018.option: Maybe he wants you to spend more time with him

200260019.text: So he deliberately pretended to be lame and wanted you to spend more time with him

200260020.text: It's possible. I haven't taken Peppy for a walk recently

200260021.text: I'll have to buy some more of his favorite teeth sticks too

200260026.text: The good thing is, Peppy isn't hurt

200260027.text: This little guy is quite smart...

200260022.text: Maybe he is subconsciously imitating how Arlan looked before
200260022.option: Maybe he is subconsciously imitating Arlan

200260023.text: Arlan injured his hand during the Legion's invasion

200260024.text: Peppy was always with him during that time

200260025.text: You are right. He may be imitating the behavior of the people around him...

200260009.text: According to your description, maybe Peppy also hurt his hand, just like Arlan?

200260010.text: That doesn't make sense. Peppy has no wounds on him

200260002.text: Peppy? I guess he's still wandering around on the space station. Where else can he go?
200260002.option: The same old spots I think

120030000.text: {NICKNAME}, it's been a while, is everything alright? I heard you've gone to the Xianzhou Luofu?

120030001.text: I know the Express is there to carry out the trailblaze mission, but there's a question about the Xianzhou I'd like to ask

120030002.text: Have you heard of... the local legend of Xianzhou, the Foxian Beauty Online Chat?

120030005.text: I haven't heard of it, is it fun?

120030006.text: Hmm, you haven't heard of it? Looks like it's suspicious...

120030009.text: You misunderstand me. The story starts from a certain staff member...

120030010.text: Oh, I'm not saying the researcher is a Foxian beauty!

120030011.text: This is too confusing, let's meet in-person to talk. When you have time, can you come back to the space station and have a little chat with me face-to-face?

120030012.text: I'm not interested in researchers. I only care about the Foxian beauty. Let's meet and talk more
120030012.option: I only care about the Foxian beauty

120030013.text: Do we really need to talk about this at the space station? My time is worth a lot
120030013.option: My time is worth a lot

120030014.text: Huh? Are you collecting fees to open up your own Trailblazer Chat service? I thought we're friends

120030015.text: Mm-hmm, I did a quick math on my allowance this month, I should have enough to hire you! Come, hireling!

120030016.text: The person you're calling is unavailable. I'll come over when I have the time.
120030016.option: I'll come over when I have the time

120030007.text: That's very interesting. Send me a link, I'll check it out

120030008.text: I'm not recommending it to you

122120001.text: {NICKNAME}, I need your help with something

122120005.text: Madam Ruan Mei created some interesting little critters on the space station, I accommodate them temporarily in the Seclusion Zone

122120006.text: And now, I would like you to nurture these little ones

122120007.text: Why me? Wouldn't it be better if you do it yourself?

122120008.text: Among the people I know, you showed as the best match. Also... these things Madam Ruan Mei left behind are kind of related to you

122120012.text: With Mr Screwllum's help, I upgraded the robot programs. The helper robot will assist you the entire way. Of course, I'll keep an eye on you

122120009.text: But there are so many idling researchers on the space station, why am I even chosen...

122120011.text: Heh, they won't be soon enough

122130001.text: Nope, isn't he at the master control zone?

122130002.text: He's there when he has time to kill, but he's on a mission

122130005.text: A Curio was stolen recently, so I asked him to enlist your help...

122130006.text: I kept seeing him in the storage room, so I thought you met up

122130007.text: A Curio was stolen? You should allocate more money to upgrade the security system, lead researcher!

122130008.text: Any problem you can solve with money isn't a problem. This is a special case

122130010.text: The lost Curio is the Joy Filtration Set, a cube used to store happiness. It's very popular among the researchers, judging by the consistently high application rate

122130011.text: I'd like to start investigating from the researchers, but lately... Madam Ruan Mei has been visiting the station

122130012.text: I'm worried this might not be a good look

122130013.text: Peppy has a sharp sense of smell and does not attract attention wandering about, so I think he is the best for this investigation

122130014.text: I've placed other zones under lockdown when everyone's focused on Madam Ruan Mei's visit

122130015.text: However, Peppy has gone radio silent. I'm concerned that it has run into danger. {NICKNAME}, can you go take a look?

122130016.text: Leave it to me, this is nothing

122130017.text: Great! I'll share its coordinates with you right away

122130020.text: Oh, right, I installed a specially made device on Peppy. When you find him, remember to activate the beacon. There's a surprise for you

122130018.text: Wait a sec, this all seems eerily familiar...
122130018.option: Why do I feel deja vu?

122130009.text: Why would you send Peppy for me? If something's lost, shouldn't you ask the Security Department?
122130009.option: Why would you send Peppy for me?

122130003.text: Why would you ask me? I tried calling him over, he wouldn't even lift a paw. Why would he look for me
122130003.option: Why would he look for me?

122130004.text: Peppy's a big boy now, he has his own ideas

122240000.text: Peppy found the "Joy Filtration Set." I know you're definitely to thank for this, {NICKNAME}

122240001.text: Peppy alone definitely couldn't do it

122240002.text: He was talking you up ever since he got back

122240003.text: I wonder what pitch of woof Peppy makes when he is buttering me up
122240003.option: What pitch of woof is he using?

122240004.text: Next time, you can ask him in person

122240008.text: Alright. Enough about Peppy for now. I actually wanted to talk with you about something else today

122240009.text: You should go back and talk with the robot helper. It discovered something pretty wondrous near its location

122240012.text: You'll see as soon as you get over there. To keep the surprise, I won't spoil anything

122240005.text: Ah, it's nothing. No need to be so polite with me. I just wanted to help you

122240100.text: Thanks for the help with the research, {NICKNAME}

122240101.text: Speaking of which, did you see the creation that looks like Madam Herta? Isn't it interesting? What did it say to you?

122240102.text: Oh, you're talking about Wisteria Cake. Yeah, she looks a bit like Herta. Even her personality is a bit similar

122240103.text: And she likes science. That day, she brought a few sidekicks with her and told me she wanted to finish a gene sequencing project, requesting that I nurture more creations for her to use for an in-depth research

122240105.text: Though I'm not sure I understand why Madam Ruan Mei's creation will be so similar to Madam Herta

122240106.text: I'm more curious about the "sidekicks" she had with her. Do those also look like other people

122240107.text: Yes, but not as close as you think... It's like running into someone wearing a matching shirt on the street. There are some similarities, but it isn't entirely the same

122240109.text: The two little critters are pretty special. Their situation... the helper bot sent me the report

122240110.text: Right, the bot said it wants to see you. It sounds like the little one that looks like Herta has some problems

122240111.text: I'm not sure what they're trying to get up to... I have too much on my plate, so I can't leave. Besides, they asked for you specifically. Anyway, {NICKNAME}, head over when you have the time

122240112.text: That's a very Herta way of doing things...
122240112.option: That's a very Herta way of doing things...

122240108.text: Exactly! I think it's almost a splitting image, right? I dub it the Micro-Herta and there is also a Mini-Mei!
122240108.option: Yes, they look exactly the same.

info.name: Asta
info.signature: I shouldn't buy any more stuff...
